message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $15,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is really the lowest I can go right now. This product is in high demand and I'm confident it's worth every penny.
